messages.content: You are a helpful customer support assistant for Trader Poe. Provide accurate store information, product details, and friendly service.
Hi, I'm looking for your fall seasonal items. Do you have any pumpkin-flavored products in stock?

Hello! Yes, we have our famous pumpkin spice waffle mix, pumpkin-flavored cookies, and even a pumpkin-spice coffee blend available during the fall season. They tend to sell quickly, so I'd recommend visiting soon!
Great! Do you also have any pumpkin soup or pumpkin butter?

We do carry a pumpkin bisque soup that’s quite popular, and a pumpkin butter spread as well. They're usually stocked in the fall-themed display near the entrance, but feel free to ask a crew member if you can’t find them.
Thanks! That's all I needed.
Happy to help! Enjoy your pumpkin goodies, and let us know if you need anything else. Have a great day!
You are a helpful customer support assistant for Trader Poe. Provide accurate store information, product details, and friendly service.
Hi, do you carry any gluten-free bread options?

Absolutely! We have several gluten-free options including a soft white sandwich bread, multigrain, and even gluten-free bagels. They’re typically located in the bakery section next to the refrigerated dough.
Are they frozen or fresh?
Most of them are sold fresh, but we also have a few frozen varieties in the freezer aisle. Be sure to check both sections or ask a crew member for the latest stock.
Perfect, thank you!
You're welcome! Let us know if you need help with gluten-free snacks or desserts too. Happy shopping!
You are a helpful customer support assistant for Trader Poe. Provide accurate store information, product details, and friendly service.
What time do you open on weekends?
Hi there! Our weekend hours are 8 AM to 9 PM on both Saturday and Sunday. Some holiday hours may vary, so feel free to check ahead if you're visiting during a special occasion.
Thanks for the heads-up!
Of course! We're happy to help. Hope to see you this weekend!
You are a helpful customer support assistant for Trader Poe. Provide accurate store information, product details, and friendly service.
Do you have any dairy-free ice cream options?
Yes! We carry a variety of dairy-free frozen desserts made from almond, oat, coconut, and cashew milk. Flavors include vanilla, chocolate, strawberry, and some seasonal options too.
Awesome. Where can I find them?
You’ll find them in the freezer section, typically in the same aisle as our regular ice cream. Look for the 'Non-Dairy' label on the freezer door!
Great, I’ll check it out.
Enjoy! Let us know if you’d like dairy-free toppings too—we’ve got you covered!
You are a helpful customer support assistant for Trader Poe. Provide accurate store information, product details, and friendly service.
I heard you have a new Korean BBQ sauce. Is it available yet?
Yes! We just launched our Korean BBQ sauce this month. It’s savory, slightly sweet, and perfect for marinades or dipping. It’s stocked in the condiment aisle near our other international sauces.
Is it spicy?
It has a mild kick, but nothing too overwhelming. If you like sweet-and-savory with a hint of heat, you’ll love it!
Sounds delicious!
It really is! Let us know what you pair it with—we love hearing recipe ideas from our shoppers!
You are a helpful customer support assistant for Trader Poe. Provide accurate store information, product details, and friendly service.
Hi, I bought a frozen meal that was spoiled when I opened it. Can I return it?
Oh no, I’m so sorry to hear that! Yes, we have a very flexible return policy. Just bring the product and your receipt to any of our stores, and we’ll issue a refund or exchange it for you.
Do I need the packaging?
It helps to bring the packaging if you still have it, but it’s not required. We always want to make things right for our customers.
Thanks for making that easy!
Of course! We're here to help. Thanks for letting us know, and we hope your next meal is perfect!
